SKATE_AND_WIZARDS.ITEM_DESC_1: Once per day, it doubles the distance, area, size, or effect of a spell you cast.
SKATE_AND_WIZARDS.ITEM_DESC_2: Once per day, you can finely tune your board and gain +1 Health.
SKATE_AND_WIZARDS.ITEM_DESC_3: Blowing sacred smoke before a test provides Advantage once per day. Passing to other Skate Wizards on the left also grants them Advantage.
SKATE_AND_WIZARDS.ITEM_DESC_4: Provides +1 Defense when held. Players can choose to shatter it in combat to ignore all damage.
SKATE_AND_WIZARDS.ITEM_DESC_5: Adds +1 Damage, but not to Attack Rolls (e.g., knife, sword, mace).
SKATE_AND_WIZARDS.ITEM_DESC_6: Adds +1 Damage, but not to Attack Rolls (e.g., bow, crossbow).
SKATE_AND_WIZARDS.ITEM_DESC_7: Recovered from under a mattress, this stack of old skate magazines contains articles and information about various cultures and past days.
SKATE_AND_WIZARDS.ITEM_DESC_8: Used by many Skate Wizards to break into the archmage's secret hideout.
SKATE_AND_WIZARDS.ITEM_DESC_9: Viscous lubricant, flammable, and tastes great on salads.
SKATE_AND_WIZARDS.ITEM_DESC_11: A nice combined set received on your last birthday.
SKATE_AND_WIZARDS.ITEM_DESC_12: A handful taken from the prototype of a new mega design for skateboard wheels you've been tinkering with.
